name: Ice and Fire (Viki)
description:
Ice and Fire is a cooperative puzzle game where two players take control of our adorable characters Frost and Ember! Frost is extremely cold and leaves a trail of ice behind them wherever they go, whereas Ember is extremely hot and leaves behind a burning trail of fire. Frost and Ember CAN’T cross their own trails - which can lead them to get stuck - however, they CAN cross and clear each others trails to get their partner out of a jam! Can you help Frost and Ember use teamwork to collect all of the Sapphires and Rubies to complete all of the levels?

1 or 2 players

Controls

Arrow Keys - Move Frost

WASD - Move Ember

Press R to restart the level

Press Esc to pause and access the menu

Cain Harniess - Programming & Game Design

Zack Livestone - Programming & Game Design

Viki Scull - Art & Tech Art

Lewis Thompson - Music, SFX

View on the Global Game Jam site
